title: Protection & Indemnity (P&I) club certificates
dataVerified: Vessel name, vessel owner, IMO number, P&I club name, certificate number, coverage amount, policy period
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Coverage status (active/expired/cancelled). Claim history summary (if claims filed). Link to P&I club system (port state control inspectors and maritime authorities, requires authentication)
rationale: Port state control verification of maritime liability insurance. Prevents fake P&I certificates for substandard vessels. Domain binding to legitimate P&I clubs. Critical for maritime safety where port authorities must verify P&I coverage before allowing vessels to enter port. Vessels carry certificates for inspection without requiring online lookups.
